channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.0-beta.8)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.0-beta.8)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.6.0-beta.8 - 2023-11-11 # Fixed # Animator of AvatarRoot diesappears #711 1.6.0-beta.7 - 2023-11-11 # Fixed # MergeSMR broken #710 1.6.0-beta.6 - 2023-11-11 # Changed # Remove Unused Objects removes meaningless Animators and Renderers #709 Renderers without Mesh and Animators without AnimatorController is meaningless Fixed # Enablement mismatched renderers are merged instead of matched renderers #705 1.
